scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path scss scss/_index.scss css/index.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/_productos.scss css/productos.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/_faqsAndInfo.scss css/faqsAndInfo.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/_sobre-khaos.scss css/sobre-khaos.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/_contacto.scss css/contacto.css
